item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, May 31, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. AI Responses May Include Mistakes (28 points | 2 comments)
2. Photos taken inside musical instruments (505 points | 25 comments)
3. Valkey Turns One: Community fork of Redis (127 points | 39 comments)
4. Surprisingly fast AI-generated kernels we didn't mean to publish yet (248 points | 65 comments)
5. Reverse engineering of Linear's sync engine (72 points | 8 comments)
6. Simpler Backoff (12 points | discuss)
7. Mary Meeker's first Trends report since 2019, focused on AI (125 points | 52 comments)
8. Beating Google's kernelCTF PoW using AVX512 (272 points | 83 comments)
9. The ‘white-collar bloodbath’ is all part of the AI hype machine (361 points | 608 comments)
10. Show HN: MCP Defender – OSS AI Firewall for Protecting MCP in Cursor/Claude etc. (21 points | 13 comments)
11. Show HN: Icepi Zero – The FPGA Raspberry Pi Zero Equivalent (127 points | 26 comments)
12. Microsandbox: Virtual Machines that feel and perform like containers (286 points | 128 comments)
13. How large should your sample size be? (15 points | 6 comments)
14. Systems Correctness Practices at Amazon Web Services (318 points | 113 comments)
15. Java Virtual Threads Ate My Memory: A Web Crawler's Tale of Speed vs. Memory (49 points | 18 comments)
16. Revenge of the Chickenized Reverse-Centaurs (78 points | 22 comments)
17. Learn touch typing – it's worth it (7 points | 4 comments)
18. Identifying Unmarked Iron (3 points | discuss)
19. Ray Tracing in J (57 points | 8 comments)
20. Every 5x5 Nonogram (44 points | 19 comments)
21. Silicon Valley finally has a big electronics retailer again: Micro Center opens (206 points | 109 comments)
22. Anthropic launches a voice mode for Claude (77 points | 21 comments)
23. StackAI (YC W23) Is Looking for SWR and Tailwind Wizards ( | hide)
24. The Darwin Gödel Machine: AI that improves itself by rewriting its own code (163 points | 170 comments)
25. Jerry Lewis's “The Day the Clown Cried” discovered in Sweden after 53 years (149 points | 68 comments)
26. Show HN: Smart Silence – Remind your iPhone to stay quiet in quiet places (31 points | 13 comments)
27. C++ to Rust Phrasebook (21 points | 1 comment)
28. Copy Excel to Markdown Table (and vice versa) (79 points | 14 comments)
29. Adam Riess and the Hubble tension (81 points | 67 comments)
30. How to run cron jobs in Postgres without extra infrastructure (59 points | 21 comments)
